CustomField.formula: IF(LEN(Apttus_QPConfig__PriceListId__c) > 0, IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM', IF(($Profile.Name != "System Administrator" && NOT($Permission.PricingManager) && NOT($Permission.PartnerSalesManager)), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c==0,HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIPartner" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c==0,HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDOD" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c>0,HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDODDPD" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"),null))), IF(($Profile.Name = "System Administrator" || $Permission.PricingManager || $Permission.PartnerSalesManager),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUI" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"),null)), IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM' && IsCollaborationProgress__c = false, IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c == 0,HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIPartner" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c==0, HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDOD" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"), IF(NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c>0,HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDODDPD" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"),null))),null)),null)
CustomField.label: Configure Products
